## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (aac1388d71025ac7f2f7dea84dd37f82d5d7392e8714f56bfaa66803982bb1c3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@recordedfuture/rf-native' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
